Package icyllis.arc3d.vulkan

Class VulkanImageInfo

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.vulkan.VulkanAllocation
icyllis.arc3d.vulkan.VulkanImageInfo
public final class VulkanImageInfo extends VulkanAllocation
When wrapping a BackendTexture or BackendRenderTarget, the mCurrentQueueFamily should either be VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED, VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_EXTERNAL, or EXTQueueFamilyForeign.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_FOREIGN_EXT. If mSharingMode is VK10.VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, then mCurrentQueueFamily can also be the graphics queue index passed into pipeline.

Note the image type is always VK10.VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D. When importing external memory, mMemoryHandle is POSIX file descriptor or Win32 NT handle (though HANDLE is defined as void*, we can safely truncate it because Win32 handles are 32-bit significant). If it is an NT handle, it must be released manually by the memory exporter (e.g. Vulkan).
